"Meteor Showers":
"<%me>, have you ever heard about
the meteor showers that occur on Lilipur? They're very
rare, but they say on a clear night after the sandstorms
lift, you will suddenly see meteors streaking across the
sky. I know this is a bit off subject from my usual
weather forecasting, but I can't help feeling it could
be a sign of something yet undiscovered. Sorry to
trouble you again, but would you go collect
some observational data for me?"

"<%me>さん
惑星リリーパでごく稀に観察される
流星群って、知っていますか？
砂嵐の明けた後、澄んだ夜空を見上げると
ふいに流星が糸を引いて流れ始める、と。
気象予報とは若干趣を別としていますが
何かの予兆かも知れません……
お手数をおかけしますが、観察と
データ収集をお願いできないでしょうか。"
